channel.title: Client Cache Error
channel.description: Hey guys I'm starting to learn to code. I use to code dodian servers back in the day, although something that is bugging me which is probably super easy to solve is I downloaded a client and a cache and I can't seem to get the client to load the cache. I put the cache in C:/ drive called cache. I know I have to change the client so it picks up the cache is called cache.jar which file would I alter?

item.title: Client Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

mrx dodian:

Hey guys I’m starting to learn to code. I use to code dodian servers back in the day, although something that is bugging me which is probably super easy to solve is I downloaded a client and a cache and I can’t seem to get the client to load the cache. I put the cache in C:/ drive called cache. I know I have to change the client so it picks up the cache is called cache.jar which file would I alter?

Are you sure that the client is looking for the cache there?

Read full topic

item.title: Client Cache Error
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Clients don’t load clients using .jar? There are no main classes in cache, just data. ???
